reviews.review_msg: SUCH AN AMAZING PROF! explains everything so well, there was not once a time when I didn't understand something when he explained it. srsly if you don't like him (esp for stats) you either didn't go to the lectures, or didn't put in enough effort to get a good grade and that left a bad taste in your mouth. quite literally nothing bad to say AT ALL

This was my third class with Ric and he still remains my favourite instructor. He had a lot on his plate this semester, and it showed in his organization and communication habits compared to previous courses I've taken with him. But he was still a very caring and knowledgeable instructor who is approachable outside of class and good at lecturing.
